segments.text: I thought he only liked to listen ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That was before he heard Stanley sing ! I guess he couldn't stand it anymore , so he decided to give it a try himself ! Allen has a really good voice ! He sounds like Enrique Iglesias !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And he can move , too ! He dances like Ricky Martin !
segments.speaker: S2
